main event: Multiple witnesses reported sightings of unidentified flying objects in Trotwood, Ohio on August 16, 1965, observing a bright object with erratic motion.
interesting points: The object was described as being bright as a star for 2/3 of the observation time,Flashed and flickered during the sighting,Disappeared behind a black curtain-like cloud,Initially seen by one witness, later confirmed by three more observers,The sighting lasted for 15-20 minutes.
sighted object: a bright, erratically moving object in the sky
witness description: Initially seen by one witness in a friend's home, later confirmed by three others.
